name: HORRIBAL
description:
The HORRIBAL game is out now, in full version!

You might have raged on the demo so to compensate that we cranked up the rage meter and now you might rage even more. We are brainless, help us.

This game features 13 levels, with shiny coins and weird enemies that may not kill you sometimes. We also made it 125% more BADASS.

*SPOILER ALERT*

There is a BOSS in the game.
